Question
========
  
A population has on the variable Y a mean $\mu$ = 20 and standard deviation $$sigma$ = 10. One applies an intervention that causes the population mean to drop to 11.96. Now, if in a random sample of 100 individuals one obtains the H0: $\mu$ = 10 tests at a significance level of 5%, what is the power of this test? 
Answerlist
----------
* 34.1%
* 50.0%
* 68.2%
* 84.1%
